notes:
[Smoldering Marsh] is the money pick. The battle-lands will be a key part of the Standard manabase for the foreseeable future.

Other than that [Stasis Snare] is in contention for the best white uncommon. While it's a little difficult to cast, it's about as close as we've got to premium removal in this set. It's efficient, instant speed, answers anything, and it's not like people are main-decking [Naturalize].
